name: Maracuja Juicy Lip Plump Gloss
about: What it is: An all-in-one plumping balm, gloss, color, and hydrating treatment with buildable coverage and a glossy plump finish...Formulation Type: Lip Plumper..Benefits: Hydrating, Long-wearing, Plumping..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Maracuja: Visibly firms and brightens..- Superfruit Complex: Nourishes..- Vitamin E: Moisturizes...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, hydroquinone, triclocarban, and triclosan. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: The viral maracuja juicy lip plump is for your juiciest lips ever. Cushion Comfort XL Complex creates a juicy, visible plumping effect while hyaluronic acid and more than 10 superfruits moisturize. It has a non-sticky feeling and a stained-glass shine that smooths the look of lip lines for a soft, pillowy pout...Research Results: According to a study, users reported:.- 100% saw more plump lips.- 100% saw immediate hydration
ingredients: -Maracuja: Visibly firms and brightens..-Superfruit Complex: Nourishes..-Vitamin E: Moisturizes...Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Diisostearyl Malate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Ceresin, Menthone Glycerin Acetal, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Flavor/Aroma, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Benzyl Benzoate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tin Oxide, Trihydroxystearin, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Benzyl Alcohol, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Fragaria Vesca (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract, Malpighia Punicifolia (Acerola) Fruit Extract, Passiflora Incarnata Fruit Extract, Prunus Persica (Peach) Fruit Extract, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract. (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Customizable coverage: Click up once, non-retractable click reveals the perfect amount of product every time..-Apply one swipe as a hydrating treatment balm..-Layer for the perfect pop of plumped-up color..-Pro tip: Line lips with Marajuca Juicy Lip Liner (sold separately) for precision application, every time.

reviews.review_title: Save your money - Nyx is better (and cheaper)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I originally tried this as a mini in the shade Cherry Blossom from one of the holiday sets Sephora sold last year. The shade was okay but nothing special and seemed to melt when applied. I got this one in the latest lip kit from Sephora and I was really excited to try out the shimmer glass shade and the Rosy Mauve looked like it would apply as a darker color. It doesnu2019t.  At all. The color barely shows up when applied but you do get the shimmer. Paired with a brown or darker shaded lip liner, if you fill in your lips (or just use a lip stick), it works well as a topper to provide that shimmer. I also could not tell that this was plumping AT ALL. It does have a really weird mint taste if it gets in your mouth (inevitable if you eat or drink anything) but definitely would not call this plumping. This one doesnu2019t melt nearly as much as the first shade I tried. The Nyx Slick Click pens are so much better imo. The shade No Filter Needed from Nyx is comparable to this one and probably shows up a lot better. I have the Nyx pen in shade In a Mood which looks similar from the photos to the Tarte shade Currant and for $9 Iu2019m picking Nyx. The application and product are so much better than Tarte on every level. Unless you want the name associated with this, save your money.

reviews.review_title: One of my favorite lip products-SHOCKINGLY
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never thought in a million years Iu2019d love this product so much, so shout out to getting samples or else Iu2019d never buy this! I want to preface this by saying I donu2019t like plumping products due to their stingy nature (having my lips feel burnt and swollen is not ideal imo), and lip glosses or even balms just to me seem so pointless, and I never like the texture. So why do I like this?? First of all, this does not sting. It has a really RESFRESHING cooling sensation. With that said, I notice little to no plumping. Maybe my lips look a tad fuller? But they definitely donu2019t look stung by a bee. That doesnu2019t bother me. The cooling sensation actually lasts awhile too, and again, I find it resfreshing and Iu2019m hypersensitive. This glides on really nicely, it isnu2019t u2018slipperyu2019 to where it is simply going to slide off, and it absolutely is not tacky. And to my absolute surprise, it lasts deeeecently well. I was trying to convince myself to like a lip oil, and that lasts all of 10 minutes and I just donu2019t see the hype. Anyways, I bought the full size tarte plump in u2018tulipu2019 and it is super pigmented! It does NOT slide into my fine lines or smear. It will wear off, but it fades gradually and doesnu2019t cling to any weird dry spots either. If you want to put something on your lips without the full commitment of a lipstick, but canu2019t jump on the lip oil/lipgloss bandwagon, I totally would say to give this a try!

reviews.review_title: A bit expensive for what you get
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually purchased CLEAR, but that isn't an option.  I was a die-hard original formula Glossier  DotBalm fan for about 8 years, and then they changed the formula and it no longer worked for me.  I have since tried:  PawPaw, LanoLips, Summer Fridays, Tarte, Glossier Shiny Lip Gloss, Burt's Bees, Goop, Merit, and Juicy Colour Pop all in an attempt to find a cruelty-free lip gloss that nourishes my lips, stays on, and just adds a lit of gloss.  I'm going for that classy touch of make-up that makes people ask you what you are wearing. I got that a lot with an old school version of Bobbi Brown pale pink gloss (not cruelty free) and Glossier.  Comparing all the substitutes, this is what I have to say about this particular product:  PROS: - goes on nicely - nourishes your lips - stays on for a reasonable amount of time - looks nice on - I think it gives average sized lips a little luster without being over the top   CONS: - price by far is the biggest con - applicator is a huge con.  You lose a significant amount of expensive product by the time you get to the bottom. Buy yourself a Spaddy Daddy to scoop up the expensive leftovers. - It doesn't last as long as on your lips or in the tube as the original formula Glossier DotBalm. I found myself both applying more frequently (though not as frequently as Summer Fridays, for example) AND running out of the product within 1 month, while using other products at the same time.  That's a quick turn around for $25. - applicator seems to use a lot of plastic - it's a chunky device that seems largely unnecessary for a soft lip product.   In closing - I'd recommend this product IF it were on sale.  They need to change the applicator so you can get the product at the end, or reduce the price so you don't feel like you're wasting so much.

reviews.review_title: THE REVIEW I WISH I READ before buying
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful, high quality formula but I'm surprised it has such a strong COCONUT scent, since people seem to either love or hate coconut. I've read so many reviews that I want to give a detailed review here, that I wish I had read begore buying.   PLUMPING: I don't taste menthol or feel tingling, but there is an obvious COOLING sensation. So it's kind of like a gentle menthol feeling but not too distracting and no minty vibe. I don't notice my lips plumping but because it's thick and fills in lines, I think visually it gives a fuller look. For people who like plumpers Tarte nailed a non-irritating, comfy sensation.   TEXTURE: just like my image text says, this feels like a cross between a gloss, balm, creamy lipstick, plumper and a lip oil. I'd say it's a dream, comfy formula if you like high shine. Some chapstick junkies might love this as a thin, nourishing swipe.  MOISTURIZING: Yup! feels like I could wear this in sub-zero temperatures and know that my lips are protected.   TASTE: I wish more reviewers and Youtubers would discuss TASTE. This one does not have a strong taste. When layered thick it might have the tiniest bit of a clean ingredients taste with slight taste of the coconut, but so minimal.   SCENT: very strong coconut scent. I'm shocked they went with a coconut scent since many people I know hate coconut. With a thin layer I don't mind it (i love coconut) but it's not ideal to smell this while I'm drinking or eating. With a thick layer the scent is so overpowering that I'm considering returning this. I get migraines from harsh scents like this.   COLOUR: This might as well be clear. Maybe the baby pink colour shows up over a lip stain or filled-in liner. Or maybe on a darker skin tone. It kind of lightened my naturally berry-coloured lips to be more pink, but only with an uncomfortably thick layer.   VALUE: If you don't mind the scent and lack of pigment in lighter tones, this is an amazing product. It's not messy if you keep it low in the tube

reviews.review_text: I own a couple of shades of Hourglass Phantom Volumizing Glossy Balm.  They're pricey and when I saw that this dupe for that product was on sale, I bought Honeysuckle.  The formula is a bit thicker than the Hourglass product but it lasts longer and is more hydrating.  It feels pretty minty on the lips, with a nice coconut scent.  Best of all is this colour--it's just beautiful, a great dupe for Clinique Black Honey, though I like it even better, and the formula is 100x better than the Almost Lipstick.  Honeysuckle is a good reddish-brown, not too mauve, which doesn't work as well with my light-medium skin with warm undertones.  I just wish Sephora Canada stocked the matching Honeysuckle Maracuja juicy lip liner shade --it seems to be available on the USA Tarte website, but nowhere else.  Please bring it in ASAP!

Iu2019ve used about 4 or 5 times and it doesnu2019t seem to dispense much balm with 3-4 clicks.  Unsure how long this will last, but love the wear and feel.  Not sticky or greasy.  Slight coconut scent and cooling tingle feel upon application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the color. Flawed design. Kind of want a refund. Not worth the money. Probably got four uses out of it before it completely quit working. Ridiculous

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this product looks and feels. It has a cooling menthol effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved itu2019s perfect for any situation and for every day too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A thicker application than the non-plumping Maracuja juicy lip. For me this created / emphasized texture and the colors are a little more opaque than their sheer non-plumping counterparts. Would still recommend to others, but not my personal preference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells unpleasant. Zero plumping effect. Not worth the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my lordy I love these glosses! Iu2019ve used the regular Maracuja gloss and adored them. This plumping one is beautiful. It tingles a little (doesnu2019t burn!). Gives me a u201cplumpu201d effect and the Cherry Blossom color is gorgeousss! They just go on like butter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nightmare application, the applicator is not meant for this product. The product is too soft and it winds up all over the place on my face. Regret buying this as I bought 4 colors and threw out the packages so can't return. Complete waste of money. Should have come in a tube with a doe foot applicator.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you missed out on the Makeup by Mario plumping gloss, these are pretty similar. I actually prefer these ones since the Mario ones have small chunks of glitter in them, these ones donu2019t and donu2019t get grainy on the lips. Just a preference but both are amazing products! I paired this with the Refy lip liner in Dusk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The clicker stopped working after a week. Have an entire tube of product left. Do not purchase

Iu2019m rating this a 2 because i literally loved it so much and then bam it doesnu2019t go up anymore! The clicker still clicks but no product goes up just stays at a stand still where i canu2019t get any on my lips. So annoying. I am getting a refund unfortunately and might try out again Incase i had a defected one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a bit obsessed with trying out new lip products and have never been disappointed by Tarte. This lip pump is no exception. I love the minty feeling, how thick it is, the packaging and color is beautiful. Black Cherry reminds me so much of Cliniqueu2019s Black Honey but so much better. Hope to try other colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love. i have mixed berries (great natural/rosy shade) + cherry blossom (beautiful baby pink). love the minty feeling + find that they genuinely do plump, add shine, lots of hydration, + last all day! super effortless like a balm/pigmented gloss combo. don't need a mirror to apply.

reviews.review_title: Lovely, but little to no color pay off
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really like this lip plump, although the color payoff isnu2019t quite what I was expecting. Itu2019s very sheer and if you want some color you have to put more layers and then it just feels to thick on your lips. But it is very nice on the lips and has a cool minty feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip product Iu2019ve used in a long time!!! Itu2019s so smooth, and creamy. The color is GORGEOUS and the packaging is so pretty!!! I can definitely see why it sold out so fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dispenser Doesnu2019t distribute product.  The shade is very pretty, the more is a coconut oil like texture and scent, but the product only worked one week and then the clicker/ dispenser stopped working.   Iu2019ll attempt to return it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Buttery lips! I love a thicker texture on my lips. This is buttery soft as you put it on. It feels good on your lips. The color is beautiful especially for spring/summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered mixed berries which looked like a cool toned mauve/pink on all the models. Unfortunately, itu2019s more of a peachy brown on my skin tone. I am also not a fan of the cold tingling feeling that some lip plumpers have, so was glad this stated it was tingle free. It might not be an intense tingle like some other formulas out there but itu2019s definitely an intense cold menthol feeling. The formula feels ok and moisturizing, but the applicator is horrible. You have to push a clicking button located at the bottom to use. Iu2019m returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not a fan!! Had to return because it gave me the most uncomfortable minty sensation at the back of my throat after I put it on. I didnu2019t get it inside my mouth so I donu2019t know how it was having that effect on my throat! Looks pretty on but not worth the weird sensation for me. It didnu2019t even feel that tingly on the lips but again, weird throat reaction. Sephora brand Rouge Lacquer lipsticks give the same look, finish, and fuller lip effect, without the weird fragrance/minty plumping ingredients that seemed to cause a reaction for me with this Tarte lip product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color, but the click bottom doesn't work and does not push the product up. I'll be returning and repurchasing when it is back in stock just to see if I got a dud.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gives beautiful juicy lips! Love the packaging as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product but after 4 clicks dispenser does not work. I exchanged and same happened so I am returning again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS LIP PRODUCT & SHADE! If youu2019re a big fan of Cliniqueu2019s Black Cherry, then I highly recommend the shade Honeysuckle. In fact, I actually prefer this shade wayyyy more! The pigment is definitely light-medium, but still gives some good color to the lips. Since itu2019s a deeper shade, I find it looks best actually patted on rather than swiping it. It has a really nice shine and stays looking pretty when it sinks into the lips after an hour or two. The u201cstingingu201d is not bad at all and is similar to that of the Buxom lip glosses, and goes away after about 20-30 minutes. I find the feeling really satisfying honestly!! The plumping effect isnu2019t really plumping, but OMG it did fill in my natural lip lines to make them sooo smooth. Hope this helps and I wouldnu2019t hesitate on this lip product!! Loving it and definitely getting more shades.

reviews.review_title: Is there a difference in shades?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the mixed berry shade and it is more of an orangey nude tinted pink than a mauve that I expected.  It leads me to wonder if there is much difference between shades.  I had to buy online since I live in the middle of nowhere. I liked how much shine it had, and the minty feeling is nice, same to Dior.  The shade I picked didn't blend with my lip topper as well as Dior does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really like it and itu2019s a great colour. Easy to apply and gives a nice glossy look without drying your lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ju2019adore! Il laisse les levres plumber et douce. Contrairement u00e0 certain il ne laisse pas de craque de couleur lorsquu2019on lu2019applique et reste longtemps sur les levres. Il y a aussi un petit effet de menthe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: My new go to lip product!! perfect for the summer, lightweight, pigmented. I had been looking for a product exactly like this for a while. I love the applicator. The product glides on smoothly over lips and the color is buildable. It leaves a fresh, minty feeling on the lips which I love, but others may find it irritating. Other reviews mentioned there was a smell but I do not notice any smell whatsoever. I'm not sure that this product gives me any majorly noticeable plump, but my lips do feel slightly plump and I think the shine of the formula also gives the illusion of plumper lips. Either way I love this product so much and highly recommend. I got the shade poppy which is a beautiful pink perfect for spring and summer. I can't wait to buy more shades!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to get this and got it in 2 colours: Honeysuckle and Tulip. Honeysuckle is really pretty, but I wasn't a fan of Tulip which was not as much a sheer colour as Honeysuckle.   On the lips, the Maracuja lip plump feels similar to the Makeup by Mario plumping lip serum, but they really don't smell as nice and the MBM also have a bit of shimmer, where these don't. To me, this product smells slightly like coconut, and a lot like sunscreen and suntanning products... I know, weird!  Once you apply on the lips, if feels minty/cooling/plumping, (similar to the Makeup by Mario plumping lip serum) but unlike the MBM which smell minty, the coconut/suntanning/sunscreen smell/taste never goes away.  For that reason, I find this product to be disappointing  and a fail for me.  I was really looking forward to another minty lip product from tarte. I will definitely stick to the Sea Quench balms. I would recommend going in the store to smell them before buying them, I admit I have an extra sensitive nose and I'm very particular with how products smell, so you may not be as bothered by it as I am! On the positive side, they do feel plumping and hydrating!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes! Love this lip plump! Itu2019s minty like the buxom lip glosses but not as goopy. I like the component! I can control how much I need and itu2019s easy to use! I will definitely buy more shades!!!

reviews.review_title: component feels a little cheap, but great product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful, hydrating lip balm! I donu2019t know that it plumps my lips too much, but it is just so beautiful on, has decent staying power and is perfect for staying hydrated while working out and gives great color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to love this product but I hate the component. The product is too soft to be applied with this. It should have been in a wand type tube or a even a squeeze tube or something.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow these are so much better than the original in my opinion! I love the cooling sensation on the lips and the shade u201choneysuckleu201d is very similar to u201cblack honeyu201d by Clinique but, I prefer this over that any day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: What about the terrible taste this puts in your mouth?  Why is nobody saying this?  Iu2019ve never had a lip product put such a long-lasting bad taste in my mouth the way this does.  It looks good but the taste lasts for hours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this for the first 2 days, but then it started melting.  Now it's a nightmare to apply - doesn't apply evenly and makes a cakey mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product definitely does what it says it will do, plump up your lips and make them look fuller. I love the glossy shine that it gives, although I wish I had known that it had mint in it before I purchased. I'm not personally a fan of minty lip products (I find the mintiness irritates my skin a little too much for my comfort). However, if mint is not an issue for you, then it is an excellent lip product. The colour payoff is good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This way surpassed my expectations. The plumping glossy lips dreams are made of! It gets darker and plumps over 15 minutes. Amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was seriously not expecting this from tarte. Itu2019s a really nice balm, it plumps beautifully and has a stunning shine to it. However I really am in love with this color. Itu2019s not glossy like a lip gloss which I love and if anyone here uses Charlotte tilbury pillow talk lip liner I am not even exaggerating it goes absolutely PERFECTLY with the liner. It the same color and they compliment eachother so well and I am really pale and it just looks so nice on me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love this!! it's such a pretty color, super glossy, pretty packaging. the only thing I don't really like  is the menthol feel/ taste. but I would still recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, the colour is way sheerer than in the photosu2014that doesnu2019t bother me but itu2019s definitely medium to sheer colour! Itu2019s a click pen so if you click it up too high it wonu2019t go back down. Itu2019s cooling and buttery smooth, not sticky or oily or too runny, itu2019s soooo good and now Iu2019m waiting for the other shades to come back in stock! Honeysuckle is. Clinique Black Honey type of vibe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a fan of plump lip products and so far, my go-to has been Buxom but I decided to try this one. I LOVE IT! Much more pigmented than Buxom and less sticky. That tickle/burn sensation is present in both but I like a little burn so itu2019s all good. White peach is a perfect nude pink so itu2019s great for every day wear. Only con is: once you push the product out you canu2019t retract it. Wish it was retractable because I donu2019t like waisting any product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Probably one of the nicest lip products Iu2019ve used in a while! Perfect tint. Not sticky . Great moisture , lasts a cold amount of time for a gloss. Will be purchasing more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This shade is perfect for spring and summer! Itu2019s also very nursing and non sticky!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love these, if anyone missed out on the makeup by Mario lip serum sticks these are VERY similar but I actually prefer the slimmer tube, less messy. The colors are rich & glossy and also hydrating. There's a slight tingling, cooling sensation but not painful at all. They do slightly plump up the lines in your lips, making them appear more youthful & smooth. I bought a couple of these and 1 of them the clicker broke and I have to scoop the product out, so I docked a star for that.. at this price there shouldn't be issues with the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is the best lip product, super moisturizing with the consistency of a lip oil but perfect amount of color. A little tingly but not uncomfortable. This color pairs perfect with Charlotte Tilburys iconic nude lip liner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite lip product! The original was my favorite in raspberry. This is exactly the same as the OG, except the packaging is gold & beautiful!! And the formula has a little bit of a menthol spicy ness from the plumper, not tingly spicy. It's gorgeous!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Very similar in texture to the classic Juicy Lips, but minty. Natural shine, but not too shiny and feels very cushiony on. Love the colour too, although itu2019s not anywhere near as pigmented as the images show. The colour is Black Honey vibes.
